scripts.build: mkdir -p ./client/build && browserify ./client/js/apps/Common/Common.js ./client/js/apps/Viewer/Viewer.js  --standalone FileViewer -o ./client/build/Bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ]
scripts.watch: mkdir -p ./client/build && watchify ./client/js/apps/Common/Common.js ./client/js/apps/Viewer/Viewer.js --standalone FileViewer -o ./client/build/Bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env react ] ] --debug --verbose
